      • initMusicPlayer

        public static void initMusicPlayer(java.lang.String currentDirectory,
                                   javax.swing.JList listSongs,
                                   javax.swing.JLabel songInfo,
                                   javax.swing.JList listLastPlayed,
                                   javax.swing.JTable container,
                                   int columnInContainerForListSongs,
                                   int rowInContainerForListLastPlayed,
                                   int columnInContainerForListLastPlayed)
        Method to init the music player
        Parameters:
        currentDirectory - The current directory with the songs
        listSongs - The JList with the songs
        songInfo - The jLabel to display the information about the song
        listLastPlayed - The JList with the last played time
        container - The JTable container of the songs
        columnInContainerForListSongs - The column that contains the ListSongs
        rowInContainerForListLastPlayed - The row that contains the ListLastPlayed
        columnInContainerForListLastPlayed - The column that contains the ListLastPlayed
        Since:
        JMusic 1.0.0
